00201    * Destructor.

00203    template <class Interaction>
00204    AnglePotentialImpl<Interaction>::~AnglePotentialImpl() 
00205    {
00206       if (interactionPtr_) {
00207          delete interactionPtr_;
00208          interactionPtr_ = 0;
00209       }

00219    /*
00220    * Read angle interaction parameters.
00221    */
00222    template <class Interaction>
00223    void AnglePotentialImpl<Interaction>::readParam(std::istream& in)
00224    {
00225       readBegin(in,"AnglePotential");
00226       bool nextIndent = false;
00227       readParamComposite(in, interaction(), nextIndent);
00228       readEnd(in);
00229    }

00273    /*
00274    * Increment atomic forces, without calculating energy.
00275    */
00276    template <class Interaction>
00277    void AnglePotentialImpl<Interaction>::addForces()
00278    {  addForces(true, false);  }

00280    /*
00281    * Increment atomic forces and compute pair energy for this processor.
00282    */
00283    template <class Interaction>
00284    void AnglePotentialImpl<Interaction>::addForces(double& energy)
00285    {  energy = addForces(true, true);  }
00286 
00287    /*
00288    * Compute total angle energy on all processors.
00289    */
00290    template <class Interaction>
00291    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00292    void 
00293    AnglePotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeEnergy(MPI::Intracomm& communicator)
00294    #else
00295    void AnglePotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeEnergy()
00296    #endif
00297    {
00298       double localEnergy = 0.0; 
00299       double totalEnergy = 0.0; 
00300       localEnergy = addForces(false, true); 
00301       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00302       communicator.Reduce(&localEnergy, &totalEnergy, 1, 
00303                           MPI::DOUBLE, MPI::SUM, 0);
00304       if (communicator.Get_rank() != 0) {
00305          totalEnergy = 0.0;
00306       }
00307       setEnergy(totalEnergy);
00308       #else
00309       setEnergy(localEnergy);
00310       #endif
00311    }
00312 
00313    /*
00314    * Increment atomic forces and/or pair energy (private).
00315    */
00316    template <class Interaction> double 
00317    AnglePotentialImpl<Interaction>::addForces(bool needForce, bool needEnergy)
00318    {
00319       // Preconditions
00320       //if (!storage().isInitialized()) {
00321       //   UTIL_THROW("AtomStorage must be initialized");
00322       //}
00323 
00324       Vector dr1; // R[1] - R[0]
00325       Vector dr2; // R[2] - R[1]
00326       Vector f1, f2;
00327       double rsq1, rsq2, cosTheta;
00328       double energy = 0.0;
00329       double angleEnergy;
00330       double fraction;
00331       double third = 1.0/3.0;
00332       GroupIterator<3> iter;
00333       Atom* atom0Ptr;
00334       Atom* atom1Ptr;
00335       Atom* atom2Ptr;
00336       int   type, isLocal0, isLocal1, isLocal2;
00337 
00338       storage().begin(iter);
00339       for ( ; iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00340          type = iter->typeId();
00341          atom0Ptr = iter->atomPtr(0);
00342          atom1Ptr = iter->atomPtr(1);
00343          atom2Ptr = iter->atomPtr(2);
00344          isLocal0 = !(atom0Ptr->isGhost());
00345          isLocal1 = !(atom1Ptr->isGhost());
00346          isLocal2 = !(atom2Ptr->isGhost());
00347          // Calculate minimimum image separations
00348          rsq1 = boundary().distanceSq(atom1Ptr->position(),
00349                                          atom0Ptr->position(), dr1);
00350          rsq2 = boundary().distanceSq(atom2Ptr->position(),
00351                                          atom1Ptr->position(), dr2);
00352          if (needEnergy) {
00353             cosTheta = dr1.dot(dr2) / sqrt(rsq1 * rsq2);
00354             angleEnergy = interaction().energy(cosTheta, type);
00355             fraction = (isLocal0 + isLocal1 + isLocal2)*third;
00356             energy += fraction*angleEnergy;
00357          }
00358          if (needForce) {
00359             interaction().force(dr1, dr2, f1, f2, type);
00360             if (isLocal0) {
00361                atom0Ptr->force() += f1;
00362             }
00363             if (isLocal1) {
00364                atom1Ptr->force() -= f1;
00365                atom1Ptr->force() += f2;
00366             }
00367             if (isLocal2) {
00368                atom2Ptr->force() -= f2;
00369             }
00370          }
00371       }
00372       return energy;
00373    }
00374 
00375    /*
00376    * Compute total pair stress (Call on all processors).
00377    */
00378    template <class Interaction>
00379    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00380    void AnglePotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeStress(MPI::Intracomm& communicator)
00381    #else
00382    void AnglePotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeStress()
00383    #endif
00384    {
00385       Tensor localStress;
00386       Vector dr1, dr2;
00387       Vector f1, f2;
00388       double factor;
00389       double prefactor = -1.0/3.0;
00390       GroupIterator<3> iter;
00391       Atom*  atom0Ptr;
00392       Atom*  atom1Ptr;
00393       Atom*  atom2Ptr;
00394       int    type;
00395       int    isLocal0, isLocal1, isLocal2;
00396 
00397       localStress.zero();
00398       // Iterate over bonds
00399       storage().begin(iter);
00400       for ( ; iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00401          atom0Ptr = iter->atomPtr(0);
00402          atom1Ptr = iter->atomPtr(1);
00403          atom2Ptr = iter->atomPtr(2);
00404          type = iter->typeId();
00405          isLocal0 = !(atom0Ptr->isGhost());
00406          isLocal1 = !(atom1Ptr->isGhost());
00407          isLocal2 = !(atom2Ptr->isGhost());
00408          boundary().distanceSq(atom1Ptr->position(),
00409                                   atom0Ptr->position(), dr1);
00410          boundary().distanceSq(atom2Ptr->position(),
00411                                   atom1Ptr->position(), dr2);
00412 
00413          // f1 -- along dr1; f2 -- along dr2.
00414          interaction().force(dr1, dr2, f1, f2, type);
00415 
00416          factor = prefactor*(isLocal0 + isLocal1 + isLocal2);
00417          dr1 *= factor;
00418          dr2 *= factor;
00419          incrementPairStress(f1, dr1, localStress);
00420          incrementPairStress(f2, dr2, localStress);
00421 
00422       }
00423 
00424       // Normalize by volume 
00425       localStress /= boundary().volume();
00426 
00427       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00428       // Reduce results from all processors
00429       Tensor totalStress;
00430       int    root = 0;
00431       communicator.Reduce(&localStress(0, 0), &totalStress(0, 0), 
00432                           Dimension*Dimension, MPI::DOUBLE, MPI::SUM, root);
00433       if (communicator.Get_rank() != root) {
00434          totalStress.zero();
00435       }
00436       setStress(totalStress);
00437       #else
00438       setStress(localStress);
00439       #endif
00440 
00441    }
00442 
00443 }
00444 #endif
